title: Executive Order 7004-Changing Location of the Land Office for the Linkton Land District
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by section 2251 of the Revised Statutes (title 43, U.S.C., sec. 126), it is hereby ordered that the location of the land office for the Linkton land district in the State of Oregon be changed from Lakeview to Klamath Falls.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7004-Changing Location of the Land Office for the Linkton Land District Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/375210
